create_extensions: CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS postgis
sql.select_db_count: SELECT COUNT(datname) from pg_database WHERE datname='{0}'
sql.select_schema_count: SELECT COUNT(schema_name) FROM information_schema.schemata WHERE schema_name = '{0}'
sql.select_schema_tables: SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = '{0}' AND table_type='BASE TABLE'
